# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards. This product not only delivers exceptional performance but also adds a touch of elegance to your lifestyle. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $99. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly special. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $99. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $99
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
